entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
